website_summaries.verdict: Personalized look and fit with top-rated Sticky Visegrip material.
pros: 8 sizes to pick from ranging from youth small to XXL
Made with patented Sticky Visegrip material that is the number one rated grip in football
Certified legal by meeting NCAA/SFIA/NFHS standards
Comes in 6 color options and can be personalized with athlete's tag
cons: Some customers reported that the stitching comes loose after limited use

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Figured I would venture away from Nike and Under Armor to try something else. Saw the amazing reviews, even bought the sticky towel that is supposed to enhance these gloves. Long story short, I wore the gloves to one practice out the box, and the ball went through my hands 3 straight times like it was straight butter, took them off and didn't drop a single ball. I gave them to a friend and we wiped the sticky towel on it and same with him. We couldn't even grip the ball just trying to hold it. Stick with Nike and Under Armor here, learnt my lesson the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Szymczak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak on the durability issues that some other reviewers have had as I've only used these for 1 football game. Other than that these gloves are awesome! Very very sticky gloves as stated. I play running back and it rained the whole game and I never had 1 issue with these. I'm 6'0 with fairly big hands and I ordered a Large. At first I thought they weren't going to fit on my hands but once i got them on they felt great. Would recommend getting a larger size if you don't like such a tight fitting glove but perfect for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Overholser

customer_reviews.title: Way too small / UPDATED 8/1
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 16 year old son for football. Price was great and they looked cool. Well, bought an adult size large and he couldn't even get them over his knuckles. Very small. He would have needed a XXL. It's almost like they switched the youth with adult sizes. UPDATE, 8/1: The seller was awesome on this. Contacted me and made sure I had the right size. Gloves are super cool. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Steve TwentyOne

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best gloves for ball feel that I have put on. The grip is good as well comparable to the Nike Vapor Jet 4.0 which I really love but these are cheaper and give me a better ball feel then those. Hands down the best receiver glove I have used to date. The xl fit a little more snug then I thought so I will be getting a xxl. Anyone looking for a affordable great receiver glove that will compete with Nike and cutters this is it!!
customer_reviews.author: debmk

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip, Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who plays highschool varsity football. He loved them, saying they have the best grip of any glove he's ever used. The issue is the seam on the thumb of one of the gloves started to unravel which has made them useless. He only got 3 games out of them. I emailed the company but have had no response. UPDATE: The company emailed me back and they sent us new pair of gloves. Customer service was fantastic. Will be buying more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: GR8play30

customer_reviews.title: Solid gloves with better tackiness than competitive brands.
customer_reviews.text: Received my Grip Boost Stealth 1.0 gloves the other day. I'd give a 4.5/5 if I could, they aren't perfect but they are really, really good. They look great and they had no blemishes at all, looks like a high quality product. Tackiness is noticeably better than other brands I've tried so far. The material on the back of the hand is very comfortable and breathable, makes for a very nice fit and keeps hands from getting sweaty. The fit is the only knock I'd have on these, I ordered a pair of XL gloves and they seem tighter than XL gloves of other brands, would have liked about another 1/4 inch of length on these in the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: He said he caught over 100 times in the gloves and really liked that they were light weight
customer_reviews.text: My son tried the gloves out at his two a day practices. He said he caught over 100 times in the gloves and really liked that they were light weight, flexible, and had good grip. He received many compliments on the gloves. His only complaint is that they ripped in the finger after the first day of use. Hopefully this is just a one time flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very tacking glove, nice styling.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking gloves! The tacky portion is incredible on how well it sticks to things. The fabric in the back is lightweight, which helps keep your hands cool, but if you are really rough with them, they might tear after a while. So far, my son loves them and the fit is great. (10 year old, got a youth large).
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Like these gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some gloves that would help me hold on to the leash of my 170 lb mastiff when he sees a squirrel and wants to chase it. Regular gloves were too "slick" and the leash would easily go through my hands. The gloves have really helped me in this regard. I am a woman, so my hands are not huge. The Large size is very tight but they do fit. Given that they are supposed to help catch a ball, they are probably not supposed to be loose at all. Just beware that you might need a larger size. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable but the tack is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've used one pair of these gloves through 9 out of the 10 games I played this season and the tack is still super sticky. The lining on the left thumb and palm started to come apart after 3 weeks but they were still wearable. I highly recommend you get these for primarily games because they are not so durable and the stick is amazing. The material is super soft and it doesn't feel like you're wearing anything. These gloves make catching look easy they are worth the $25.
customer_reviews.author: Leonor S.

customer_reviews.title: Great company and product!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are exactly as described, made well and great gloves for my 13 year old playing football. He is 5'11" and 170 and we ordered the large, but he couldn't even get them on his hands. I contacted the seller and they promptly sent me an XL and directions to return the large. The XL are tight too, but will work great. I recommend ordering up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany J

customer_reviews.title: Love the tackiness of these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love the tackiness of these gloves. They breath pretty well too. Not sure how the durability will be with these as the inside of the palm is only has one stitch for the threading. But it could be fine. Will also get dirty over time because they are white. Overall though I highly recommend them for the price and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Warner

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but 4 games in, the tacky coating peeling off BOTH thumbs.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for just over a month and played 4 games with them. BOTH thumbs outer grip has started peeling off and have become pretty useless now. I've had other gloves that have lasted 2 seasons plus with any peeling. Pretty disappointed because they fit pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I really had hoped these gloves would work for me ...
customer_reviews.text: I really had hoped these gloves would work for me, but I have to be honest. The seams started to rip and pull apart during my very first game with them. After a few more games the sticky glove side started to rip in half. I play less than 2 hours a week and in less than 1 month these are going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good feel, tight fit but bad velcro measure
customer_reviews.text: Palm size fits perfectly, fabric is sleek and comfortable but not so stretchy. But the velcro or wrist is completely off size, the V shape can't close and most of velcro is exposed to grab on sleeves. But anyway as my bike gloves in the rain the palm has no hole so good waterproof and meet the bottomline
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are good gloves. I've had Nike and Reebok gloves in the past and the tack is very comparable to higher end gloves. They are very lightweight and comfortable. The difference will most likely be in the durability. These will most likely only last you a season, if that. Great gloves for flag football or someone playing adult league or intramurals... probably won't last a full highschool season.
customer_reviews.author: Tripp L.

customer_reviews.title: Grip Boost over the others...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the fit and feel of these gloves...not to mention the look. Me, I like the price...no athletic glove should cost $50-70, umm Nike, UA, that's ridiculous, especially when they fall apart within a month. I like the construction of the GB gloves...seems like a little thought went into them...stretch and stress points and seams specifically. We'll see how they weather a long season, but Grip Boost is at the top of my list to date.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Is this for a "stick-figure"?
customer_reviews.text: Ironically I always suffered from a thin (whimsy) wrist syndrome, and my 13y old son (5'10" @145#) is quite well proportioned, so size (adult) M should be just right, and hand/finger wise it fits well, but it's extremely difficult putting them on as the wrist-cuff is very narrow and practically impossible to wrap the velcro shut.
customer_reviews.author: VoyT

customer_reviews.title: Stitching came loose.
customer_reviews.text: In less than a week the stitching started to come loose on 2 of the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Randy T.

customer_reviews.title: Great all football season
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for a 9 year old. They stayed sticky and held up well over the whole football season. They were worn to every practice, and every game. My boy really liked them. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not Just Football!
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves for rope climbing. I have a twenty foot nylon/dacron rope hanging from a tree. It is much more slick than my old sisal rope, even though it holds up to weather much better. Without the gloves, it's hopeless. With them, up I go! They are perfect for my needs. They probably don't last as long for rope climbs as they would for football, but worthwhile in any case.
customer_reviews.author: bdg

customer_reviews.title: As Described, But Long Fingers
customer_reviews.text: My son is extremely happy with these gloves! They are as described. As other reviewers stated, the fingers are a little long. With that said, they still work well and my son thinks they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dogma Dog

customer_reviews.title: A Better Type of Glove
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are fantastic! The tack on them is arguably the best on the market. They definitely feel lighter than other gloves, and have a beatheability to them that is unmatched. They wrist closures don't choke and aren't tight which gives the receivers a greater range of motion. We tested them out on the practice field, and when they got dirty, we used some Grip Boost, and they were like new again. Most importantly for the players...they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fake gloves
customer_reviews.text: They are not original, I got totally white, they are nothing like the description or the image, it passes a lousy order unfortunately. I don't recommend this product at all
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: OCR gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use during OCR races. They work well with rope obstacles and crawls etc but don't get the best grip on the rings etc when wet so I just take them off for those obstacles. I will buy again though when these are done.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: Everyone orders these on the team!
customer_reviews.text: Son is 8 and worked great for him during football season most the other kids used this brand too.
customer_reviews.author: Macey

customer_reviews.title: The best gloves available
customer_reviews.text: Grip boost are the best gloves on the market. I have a son who is a HS wide receiver. I have purchased Battle, UA, Nike, adidas, cutters, phenom and Wilson throughout his youth and HS career. Grip Boost fit the best and last longer than all the others on the list. There are many good gloves from the list above, but only one, grip boost is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These glove are a great value! The grip is excellent
customer_reviews.text: These glove are a great value! The grip is excellent, and the use of light weight breathable material allows for tremendous dexterity and great maneuverability. These gloves posses many features that most high end gloves of today utilize. Such as full length grip spanning the entire length of the hand and perforations through out the palm and fingers allowing for added ventilation. These gloves fit true to size and are very comfortable. And only time will tell how durable these gloves actually are, but so far their life span seems promising. But for the price these gloves cant be beet. I would recommend these gloves to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review for these on IKnowFootball's youtube page and figured "it's $25, might as well give it a shot" Super sticky grip (better than Nike, on par with Cutters), compression fit, unique gusset/custom feel, and unbeatable price Definitely give it a shot if you want elite grip performance for absolute value pricing
customer_reviews.author: Allen H.

customer_reviews.title: Pure Junk
customer_reviews.text: Disposable gloves. After 1 qtr of freshman football the gloves came apart at the seams in 3 places - by the end of the game - both gloves fell apart to the point where they couldn’t slay on the hand. Worst quality product I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great grip! Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the grip of these gloves! Easy to catch and throw with. I've warn them maybe 4/5 times and they are already falling apart. Feels like cheap plasticy pvc type material and they are ripping everywhere. I'm about to order a new pair of gloves and, unfortunately, it won't be these.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Great sticky receiver gloves. A must purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves. Uses twice a week for flag football practice and games. So far these gloves had not have had the glove “stank” yet. Have had them for about 6-8 weeks now. Bought with the Grip Boost Gel. They work perfect together. Add about a nickel size drop and they are brand new sticky!
customer_reviews.author: Hendu

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work well in practice! They fit well, but are a little tight around the wrist in the Adult Medium size, but that could just be my hand. Would highly recommend to someone looking to purchase some!
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping!!Awsome material and nice color scheme!! Bought for my 11 year old son and hes stoked..got a Youth large, it is a little snugg fit maybe buy a size or 2 up for those with a little thicker hands!! Besides that we are super happy with our buy and we definitely recomand!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: Solid pair of gloves. Very comfortable and the tackiness is as good as you will find in much higher priced gloves. I catch just as well with these as i have in the past with Nike or Cutters. As stated on other reviews, the gloves do fall apart a bit after use. For me this was 3 games and a practice. I'm still using the gloves because the condition is not THAT bad and the tackiness is still there. Overall, I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Juss

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These gloves arrived in a timely manner and look great. But - after three practices (didn't even make it to a game), the areas where the fingers connect to the hand of the glove had ripped in both gloves. Normally, our receiver gloves last about 6-8 weeks, so these were a real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: R. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The grip was like no other! Making one handed catches easy for even beginners. The grip stayed tacky throughout the whole game. Only 2 things that could've been seen as a negative was dirt attracts to the white but I didn't care and the Velcro on the wrist doesn't give much adjustment so make sure you order your accurate size I would say that the size they advertise runs true. I was really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Sticky gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Because of these gloves, I caught an interception. You'll get one too assuming you have hands of course. Without them, the ball would've slipped right through my butter fingers and my flag football days would have been over! Also, make sure you measure your hand and follow the size chart.... You don't want to miss a week by exchanging it.
customer_reviews.author: Noopshopz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used other gloves before this one and I can truly say these are the best ones around! I feel like it's a part of my hands, it breathes great and doesn't make my hands sweat, I use these for high school football and I'm catching passes and holding on to the ball. Teammates always borrow them. Told them to order their own from this company! Fast delivery as promised. purchased Medium size
customer_reviews.author: EZ duz it

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: The seem split after the first use. Just kept splitting all over the fingers. My 15y/o plays flag football. It's not like they took a beating before falling apart. I even ordered a size up, no bueno. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ali & Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very Sticky, Durability Concerns
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very sticky Back of hand material is breathable Easily refresh tack in-game with some water or spit Secure fit Lightweight Works with touch screen phones (YMMV) Cons: Tears form at the seams after a few weeks Sticky surface on finger tips begins to get marred after catching bullets Difficult to put on and take off Overlays on the back of the hands wear off quickly
customer_reviews.author: Drew C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for High school football. He loves them. They practically stick to each other and make being a receiver a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 year old. Got the Youth Large. Gloves seem to fit him fine. They are rather thin but are super sticky. Season hasn't started yet but I don't see these gloves lasting very long. But hey, they were cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Decent gloves
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars because they did not grip as much as my son wouldve liked but overall a decent glove.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: These Gloves are not what i expected in the best way possible thought for the price they would be a one and done deal, used them for an 8 hour tournament no tear. I've used other more expensive brands that come ripped out of the box. However these gloves are awesome, deff would recommend these to anyone for football.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Please Read!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of gloves! I would recommend buying the grip gel along with the gloves. It only comes with one bottle but it has lasted me 4 months. Been using these gloves for the past couple months they have lasted and worked great. I’ve even washed them. I do put it on the gentle cycle to make sure it doesn’t wear on the fabric of the gloves. Other than that great product! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Saraceni

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy the Expensive Brand Sports Names
customer_reviews.text: Great practical design and buy for the money. My teenager thought they were great the second he put them on. The back of the gloves are open (free of logo material) so the hand can breath. Palm material is quite sticky; my son can catch any long lob pass with just one hand, and a laser shot is a breeze with two.
customer_reviews.author: SuprDavE

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for the annual turkey bowl. I didn't want to pay Nike prices for something I use once or twice per year. These didn't disappoint. I've never had more sure hands. A couple of TD's and interceptions made for a great day of football, and these helped with the cold and wet conditions. I definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: phroboy

customer_reviews.title: Great grip! Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I just played football with my brother. They have excellent grip. They look great too. When you put your hands together, they form the letters GB in the palms, and that looks cool. They're great gloves, and I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jaster

customer_reviews.title: work very well
customer_reviews.text: My son used these for football. He said they work very well for catching and holding on to the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Look, feel, and performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is incredibly picky when it comes to look, feel, and performance. In high school it's not enough to just catch touchdown passes but you need to look good doing it. My son really loves these gloves. They fit his style preferences but more importantly he really like the performance and the stickiness. These are great gloves and I wouldn't hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: and these are some of the best gloves I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have played with numerous amounts of football gloves, and these are some of the best gloves I have ever used. Amazing grip, and fit. Unfortunately, they are not as durable as some of the competitors out there. They ripped in multiple places after just a few uses: Hence the 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these gloves and love the grip but even more so the design and fit! The big brands I always used to buy so figured I would try something different and these gloves fit better then any other the way there made its different feel like hard to explain they just fit my hand wayyyy better. I'm tall and play reciever and have been through a ton of gloves...my new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: brian dorey

customer_reviews.title: BEST Grip Out!!!
customer_reviews.text: The grip on these gloves was super!, however I felt these gloves went on the tighter size and because of this from multiple games the seams started to rip... It did not really matter because it dis not affect my performance.
customer_reviews.author: Hibiki

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: These glove were a ok fit the problem is the stitching on both gloves fell apart . My son is 7 years old and has only been practicing 3 days a week and the gloves already fell apart . We have had them for 1 month ...... I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Mr Abbott

customer_reviews.title: lasted 1 day
customer_reviews.text: gave these to my 13-year old nephew and he said all the stickiness was gone after just a day of use
customer_reviews.author: A. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for all types of weather
customer_reviews.text: These gloves never seem to lose grip. For the price that they are at the quality of the gloves seem to be a steal. They are perfect for all types of weather. These gloves definitely are helping reach my dream of being a division 1 intramural star. The fit is perfect to my hand and the material is very comfortable to deal with. The las pair of gloves i had lost grip and the velcro stopped working so my gloves never stayed on but this pair of gloves seems to always stay MINT!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved them
customer_reviews.text: fit and feel was great. Was throwing a football and gave him a better grip as a quarterback
customer_reviews.author: Tony NYC

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are very nice but I spacifically asked for an xl 2 people ...
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are very nice but I spacifically asked for an xl 2 people responded they were in fact a youth size I received them and they are marked an adult xl so I’m returning them. Wish they were clearly marked adult or youth.
customer_reviews.author: Emma#sasanache

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 Sizes Up
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the glove is great. However, buyer beware.... Order 2 sizes up. Don't measure from base of the palm to the tip of the middle finger, it's worthless. If you're a college athlete, get an XXL. (Pictured is an Adult L)
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality/price ratio I could find across all glove manufacturers.
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. I'm 26 and play intramural flag football (high school football days are long over) and they have retained their stickiness through 5 games so far. I wore cutters in high school and I'm impressed with the quality of these gloves relative their their price and am now a lifelong customer of the product. If these gloves ever do lose their stickiness, i'll just apply some glove grip and they'll be good as new. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rothschild

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: My son put them on immediately and has been using them at practice this summer.
customer_reviews.author: dheavne

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOOTBALL GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY STICKY,COMFORTABLE AND OVERALL VERY GOOD FOR ITS PRICE.still have mine after 3 years of hard use and still works like a beaut
customer_reviews.author: Can14

customer_reviews.title: Decent glove
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn comfortable, good grip at first but doesn’t last a while. They make good practice gloves. I use Nike Vapor for game gloves. As a wide receiver it’s very important to have gloves that you can count on. While these aren’t bad they also aren’t great. Like i said they make fine practice gloves but for games definitely spend a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: Super tacky as listed and fit perfectly by simply following their sizing chart.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mongeon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even make it to halftime of the first game.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are light, and have a pretty good tacky grip. However, they got a hole in the seam at the base of the thumb 5 minutes into my first game using them. So, the gloves seem to work well, but the reliability wasn't great for the pair I got.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Read

customer_reviews.title: One hand catch
customer_reviews.text: It runs small, just fit my grandson. He been practicing said glove is helping and it looks good
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves them and they have out lasted under armor, battle, Nike, and adidas of which are the ones we have tried!!! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jose Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Grip
customer_reviews.text: The gloves have great grip but over time it goes away. But all u need to do is get some wipes and wipe the gloves and you gloves should be nw again. Or you can just buy the grip boost gel.
customer_reviews.author: Ashmit T.

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, not thick and cumbersome like others my son tried. And yes they really are stickier!
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: BEST GLOVES EVER
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because my previous gloves always wore out then I saw grip boost and I ordered it right away and I revived it today and the grip on the gloves is outstanding my brother tried on the gloves and he was even amazed I ordered the grip boost gel because this product is amazing and your hands won't get sweaty inside the gloves because there is air holes which makes the gloves even more better, as well as it is durable and the friction is really good with the football sticks to the football really well and I will be buying more products from grip boost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son says that he loves how great they are and they fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie markle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used them for an entire football season and held up great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip!  Excellent Price.
customer_reviews.text: I wore Cutters for many years while playing high school & college football, and I can hardly tell a difference between the brands, with Grip Boost gloves coming in at a much cheaper price. I really like the breathability of Grip Boost gloves. I plan on playing in flag football leagues for years to come, and I can tell you they've won my business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and great product!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this company 10 stars if I could!! Great customer service, great product. I bought a pair in February and I ripped one of the gloves (due to my hard play, not quality), and the company replaced my pair in less than a week. These gloves have also kept their stick longer than any under armor or Nike gloves I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ford

customer_reviews.title: DOPE SET OF GLOVES AT A DOPE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves around 2 weeks ago and they have been amazing. First of for the price these can not be beat. They provide spectacular grip and surprising durability. When you take a first glance at the glove they look like they won't hold up due to the back of the gloves being so thin. Another thing that should be mentioned one more time IS THE PRICE. It simply can't be beat for the quality that you get.
customer_reviews.author: davedas23

customer_reviews.title: size was wrong
customer_reviews.text: quality seems good but sizing chart was wrong I measured my sons hand and bought according size and it was SO small he couldn't even squeeze into them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rips at the seams
customer_reviews.text: I've played 6 flag football games in them. They are pretty comfortable but ripped on game #2
customer_reviews.author: Dustin New

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves. They fit nice and tight. And the stickyness is great to grip the football
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Rikki Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Ripped seams first game.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great but didn’t last a single game before ripping out the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are A+
customer_reviews.text: My son thinks these gloves are better than the $60 UA gloves I bought him earlier. He loves the fit and they are really tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bierma

customer_reviews.title: Tacky and help with receptions
customer_reviews.text: Bought the glove for my grandson, they fit like a glove 😎. They are tacky and will help with receptions. I also bought the liquid to refresh the tack when it wears out. This is a god product and will buy again when he needs new gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell  Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: At first, it took a few catches to get used to them. After our warm-ups I really started getting used to them and started liking them. I feel they are great football gloves. They are very light weight, they have a clean stylish look and stick to the ball very well. I already recommended them to my teammates at the collegiate level. The only con is the grip started to fade after 5 practices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further these are all you need
customer_reviews.text: 8 games of playing TE and they are still sticky just like day one. They have withstanded aggressive blocking and over 20 catches. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very good gloves. His last gloves lasted until he grew ...
customer_reviews.text: bought these gloves less then a month ago and my son has worn them about 12 times between practice and games and they have already ripped and have had the stiching come undone. Not very good gloves. His last gloves lasted until he grew out of them. These gloves look nice, but wouldn't recomend for playing.
customer_reviews.author: cha cha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, strong, and attractive gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 6 year old son for football. The youth small fits perfectly and the gloves are very strong. The blue and white looks very nice. They have a very strong velcro straps also.
customer_reviews.author: Navneet Gosal

customer_reviews.title: They're Okay
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are thin and lightweight and they have good grip. However when wet they are very slippery, so I would only recommend using them in dry conditions. They are also very thin and can rip easily if used carelessly, but overall a decent glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on/off, very tight.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it would of been a great glove!! The material is awesome! Sadly its really tight.. like crazy tight, it took me a bit to get them on/off my hand. Im usually a small but i prob should of gone with a medium after reading the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Aus

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves for my nephew for Christmas....he attaches himself to certain items, like baseball helmets and wears them non-stop. These gloves have held up all winter, with him only taking them off at times to shower! Great fit, and remain sticky! Which he loves!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Maynard

customer_reviews.title: For the price. Great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price they held up great. The grip gel works great also.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dornquast

customer_reviews.title: Gloves were fantastic! I was afraid my boys were going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Gloves were fantastic! I was afraid my boys were going to stick their nose up because the gloves weren't the "brand" that they wanted. However.... they said that these gloves were better and more sticky than "said brand." You have two happy customers (and a happy mommy.) My only suggestion is to please make a Youth size. My little one is 11 years old and the small is still way too big. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Neuer

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart before first game!
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn theses gloves about 30 times to football practice, has yet to have a game and they are falling apart. We have always bought receiver gloves and they have lasted seasons without falling apart. These don't last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability concerns
customer_reviews.text: So these came quickly but unfortunately they did not hold up well. My high school son used them for 3 practices and he now has 2 holes in them along the seams on the fingers. Sizing and fit is good however durability leaves much to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great service
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and customer service really stepped up for me. My grandson is thrilled with his gloves!!
customer_reviews.author: lrk

customer_reviews.title: They have great breathe ability
customer_reviews.text: "The comfiest gloves I have ever put on" said my son. He really loves them. They have great breathe ability, an all around glove he told me. They also have great grip and maintain their stickiness. They are true to their fit and are easy to slip on and off. With these he says, "you will Odell everything".
customer_reviews.author: Marni Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these they work amazing the only issue is the size was smaller than we expected
customer_reviews.author: westes

customer_reviews.title: Glove works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves for an up coming football game. I just went out with my brother and we tried these gloves out. It is true to its advertisement. It fits perfectly. It increased my catching skill level to the max. I love these football gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Not Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great looking gloves but the letters started peeling off post wearing for three days.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Receiving gloves that work!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Watch the video on Grip Boost home page, the results are real! After playing D1 football myself, I have seen multiple pair of Nike & Under Armour receiving gloves fail after one game. Buy a pair and see the results for yourself !
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gerke

customer_reviews.title: Great grip.
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased these for crossfit rope climbs. They worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Grip Boost Football Gloves Mens #1 Grip Stealth Pro Elite - Adult & Youth Football Glove Sizes
product_meta.description: Grip Boost Stealth Pro Elite Football Gloves are a fierce new competitor on the field. Dissatisfied with the problems posed by available brand and models, pro athletes and inspired scientists huddled up and put their wisdom and expertise together to formulate new solutions and provide advanced technology to step your game up. A formula conceptualized through a blend of passion for both performance and science, these football gloves provide the best grip for professional athletes, youth football gloves, and high school football players. Available for all players, Grip Boost offers adult and kids football gloves. A thin polymer layer offers ease of mobility while providing just the right friction to grip and catch the ball with ease. These durable gloves with support in all the right places provide enhanced performance game after game. Compression material with a large gusset creates a fit comparable to custom football gloves. The best football gloves for any weather, this advanced polymerization technology provides the #1 grip in football. Tired of buying new gloves every few games because the tack wears out? Our proprietary grip boost gel formula can be re-applied to make the gloves brand new without leaving a mess on the football, the gloves, or your clothing. Lightweight material provides comfort and allows for responsive grip and ball feel in these cool football gloves that are light enough to keep your hands moisture-free even in hot and humid temperatures.
feature_bullets: IMPROVED GRIP: This sticky football gloves youth & Adult has the right amount of tacky grip to enhance every play. With our proprietary formula grip boost football glove grip made from crab shell. This unique layer is made with advanced suspended polymerization technology that provides the #1 grip in football performance gear. While other gloves lose grip after a couple of games, a quick application of grip boost football glove grip gel on these durable gloves will keep performing.

BREATHABLE VENTILATION: Light enough to keep your hands moisture-free in hot and humid temperatures so you can focus on your game. This football glove design was crafted by analyzing the flaws in other models to address issues that inhibit optimal performance. A better feel and thin design offers responsive performance that puts you in control and enhances your skills.

ADJUSTABLE FOR PERFECT FIT: The back-of-hand has a unique compression material that is designed to conform to the contour of your hand, with a large gusset to provide a custom fit football glove. Grip Boost Stealth Pro Elite Football Gloves fit like a second skin. Theyre not bulky or stiff. With maneuverability, theyre so stealth you can forget youre wearing a glove and focus on the game. Lock down the field and own the game, play-by-play.

ALL WEATHER: Grip Boost Football Glove Gel is specially formulated to react and stick in any weather. Play like the pros, rain-or-shine. These adult & kids football gloves are perfect for bringing in a clean catch without fumble. Confidence in all conditions when you need to pull it in to secure the play.

COMFORTABLE FEEL: Keep control with precision thanks to the thin, barely-there feel material with grip and support when you need it most. Moisture-wicking and ventilation prevent chafing and reduce distraction. These receiver gloves offer optimal function thats fit for the pros, designed by the pros, yet perfect for every player. Get the competitive edge that secures the ball.
